description: The Carex oshimensis 'Everillo' sedge is an amazing plant species due to the bright green colour of its foliage and its ability to retain its vibrant look in the toughest of climates. It has strong and sturdy foliage, making it able to withstand strong winds and strong sun. The foliage stands upright, giving gardens a lovely uniform look. It also forms an attractive mounded shape, making it a wonderful ground cover that can be used to frame other plants. It is a great choice for low maintenance gardens as it requires very little pruning and maintenance. It can be used in mass plantings or as an accent in beds and borders. Its stunning emerald green colour and dwarf form will certainly add a splash of colour and texture to any garden.
